Dr. Tan takes a personalized approach to each case, focusing on the pet’s health history and lifestyle, while collaborating with other healthcare providers to ensure holistic treatment plans.

Dr. Carson’s work is informed by her extensive research background, and she’s committed to educating pet owners on the importance of genetic testing.
